text: Kuma daga Mutanen Littafi akwai wanda yake idan ka ba shi amanar kinɗari,* zai bayar da shi gare ka, kuma daga gare su akwai wanda idan ka ba shi amanar dinari, ba zai bayar da shi gare ka ba, face idan ka dawwama a kansa kana tsaye. Wannan kuwa, domin lalle ne su sun ce, "Babu laifi a kanmu a cikin Ummiyyai.**" Suna faɗar ƙarya ga Allah, alhali kuwa suna sane
